ttp_template:
<group name="state">
    state {{STATE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="state_autoneg_interface">
    auto-negotiati{{STATE | ORPHRASE}} {{AUTONEG | ORPHRASE}} ({{INTERFACE | ORPHRASE}})
</group>
<group name="ipv6_ll_address_ipv6_ll_mask">
    ipv6-local-link-address {{IPV6_LL_ADDRESS}}/{{IPV6_LL_MASK | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
Interface Mgmt
    state on
    mac-addr 00:1c:7f:00:11:22
    type ethernet
    link-state link up
    mtu 1500
    auto-negotiation on
    speed 1000M
    ipv6-autoconfig Not configured
    duplex full
    monitor-mode Not configured
    link-speed 1000M/full
    comments
    ipv4-address 192.168.1.1/24
    ipv6-address Not Configured
    ipv6-local-link-address fe80::21c:7fff:fe00:1122/64
